Texts.Eng: You'll eventually find other sources for these useful materials, but for now this is the best method you have access to. Experimentation will get you far!

You've gathered ^orange;water^reset;! If you want to gather ^green;Hydrogen,Oxygen and Salt^reset;, collect some ^orange;water^reset; and then use any ^orange;hand mill or extractor^reset; to create ^green;5 hydrogen^reset;!
